data.title: Decent pizza
data.text:
Got an order delivered to our hotel from here. I guy I golfed with in Sun Valley recommended it when he found out we would be staying here.

Pizza was OK, they forgot to add the  pineapple I asked for but they didn't charge for it either. Crust was good but the sauce seemed a bit thin. Toppings were distributed kind of randomly, that is, not consistent over the pizza.

OK pizza but I'd probably try somewhere else if I was here again.

data.title: Service is awful & food isn't at all worth the terrible service
data.text: Will never go back. Had ordered delivery and they got lost and acted like I gave the wrong address. They were very rude about it and the food was not very good. With so many other pizza options, I would never go here again.

data.title: From college days to now
data.text: A great place on the mall too meet friends over some delicious pizzas. Used to have backgammon boards, now I bring my own. Great tasting pizzas and cold beer !

data.title: Yummy, filling pizza!!
data.text: A long time favorite of mine! Thick crust, lots of cheese, fresh ingredients. Very filling! The Barnstormer and the Combo are my favorites I'm glad they reopened and moved back to the downtown area. Only reason I didn't rate a 5 is that I miss the dinner buffets and the lunch buffets are not always consistent.

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: Loved Waldo's when I lived in St Cloud and now every time we are in the area we stop in and have the pizza and cheese bread. Also we love the wings with the home made sauce. I really wish we had a Waldo's in Minneapolis

data.title: Great!
data.text: We have loved Waldo's for years, and we were glad when the restaurant reopened. We stopped in for a pizza before a show at the paramount and it was delicious!

data.title: Love this pizza
data.text: This pizza has a delicious unique flavor all it's own,been my favorite forever! The only thing I wish they'd do is ask if you'd like thin crust or original,sometimes I forget to specify,I prefer the thin crust. They also have the best bread sticks.

data.title: Best pizza ever!
data.text: Waldo's pizza is our hands down favorite!  We order the B52 Bomber.....we've been going here for many many years and have never had a bad experience!

data.title: Worst management and poor service
data.text: In the area for work and ordered pizza here for delivery. When it finally arrived, cold, it was missing extra sauce I requested. I chased down delivery guy who I generously tipped after I realized my order was incomplete. He said pretty much too bad I can come back in an hour. Called and the owner proceeded to tell me I was wrong and hadn't ordered this etc. Failure, epic failure on management to recognize their error and make it right. Bad pizza. Bad service and undoubtedly bad management. Save your money and go elsewhere!

data.title: Waldos
data.text: We always have the barnstormer pizza .We love there pizza , wings , and cheesebread.Good food good service .Thanks waldos we love ya.

data.title: Great pie
data.text: Found Waldo's to be a great find..used a coupon out of local paper to secure a great deal on 2 different pizzas that were made fast and fresh. I ordered it as takeout.. It isn't much to look at inside but they make a quality pizza. Very cheesy..

data.title: Local Pizzeria
data.text: I ordered a pizza for delivery one evening while I was in town working.  I ordered the small Aviator with the original crust.  It was Delicious with lots of toppings!--The "original" is a bit of a thick crust; but very tasty with a slightly sweet flavor to it.  I enjoyed several helpings of leftovers.

data.title: Best Pizza in town hands down
data.text: By far my favorite pizza in the area and I think i have had them all. What is really cool about going to the restaurant is they have all the original booths and tables from the original location downtown. I f you haven't tried it you should.

data.title: WASTE of TIME and MONEY.
data.text: This was an awful experience. Pizza tasted straight out of my elementary school cafeteria. Service was horrible and the atmosphere was down right depressing, very gloomy and had a back alley feel. Don't waste your time with this place.
